Name: Lewis-Plast Premium 92 Piece First Aid Kit - Safety Essentials for Travel, Car, Home, Camping, Work, Hiking & Holiday Red , Small
Reviews: This low cost but medical items packed First Aid kit should me the need of any small accidents or provide a means to get you and your to A+E.I added some paracetamol, some Aspirin and some Cocodamol and a small tube of antiseptic ointment because after spending so little on this really great minor injury First Aid pack, it seemed silly not to.It lives in a kitchen drawer, but it's fully self contained and will go with us on trips and holidays because it only actually works if you have it with you when you need it.I will take it with us on trips and travel because I know how expensive and life threatening it can be when you don't.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 February 2024
